main event: Three circular objects, each the size of a full moon, were observed traveling in a horizontal line. They glowed but were not bright, and disappeared by fading out within 4-5 seconds of observation.
interesting points: The objects were described as dull white in color and did not leave any trail behind them.
They did not produce any noise as they moved.
The trajectory of the objects originated a little east of south, continued northeast, and then faded out altogether in the east.
The sighting occurred at night in Wantagh, New York, near the corner of Dahlia and Deplane.
The report also notes the passing of a 4-engine aircraft heading due west at low altitude shortly after the UFO sighting.
